result.title: Back From Summer contest on DMOJ with Amazon gift card prizes!
result.content:
Hi codeforces, summer is just about over, and school is around the corner. We hope you had a great summer, and we want to make your school year even greater by kicking off with a new rated contest on the Don Mills Online Judge (DMOJ), including Amazon gift cards as prizes!

The contest will take place in a 2-hour window anywhere from Friday 3:30 PM — 11:00 PM EDT, and will consist of 6 problems of CCC Junior — CCC Senior difficulty, which is roughly equivalent to codeforces div 2 round.

Prizes for the contest winners are as follows:

  • 1st place: $10CAD
  • 2nd place: $5CAD
  • 3rd place: $5CAD

You can view more detailed information on the contest page over at DMOJ.
